computer = context
 portal = context.getPortalObject()
 
 partition_list = portal.portal_catalog(portal_type='Computer Partition',
 free_for_request=0,
 parent_uid=computer.getUid())
 
 # Get Hosting Subscription for all allocated partition
 hosting_subscription_list = []
 for partition in partition_list:
 software_instance = partition.getAggregateRelatedValue(
 portal_type='Software Instance')
 if software_instance:
 hs = software_instance.getSpecialiseValue(
 portal_type='Hosting Subscription')
 if hs and hs.getSlapState() in \
 ['start_requested', 'stop_requested'] and \
 not hs in hosting_subscription_list:
 hosting_subscription_list.append(hs)
 
 if len(hosting_subscription_list) == 0:
 return
 
 for hosting_subscription in hosting_subscription_list:
 is_upgradable = hosting_subscription.HostingSubscription_isUpgradable()
 if not is_upgradable:
 continue
 
 newer_release_string = hosting_subscription.\
 HostingSubscription_getNewerSofwareRelease()
 if not newer_release_string:
 continue
 
 software_release = portal.portal_catalog.getResultValue(
 portal_type='Software Release',
 url_string=newer_release_string)
 if not software_release:
 continue
 
 title = 'A new software release is available for %s' % \
 hosting_subscription.getReference()
 # Search if exist upgrade decision for this Hosting Subscription (by title)
 is_decision_in_progress = software_release.\
 SoftwareRelease_isUpgradeDecisionInProgress(title=title)
 if is_decision_in_progress:
 continue
 
 return software_release.SoftwareRelease_createUpgradeDecision(
 source_url=hosting_subscription.getRelativeUrl(), title=title
 )
